item.description:
The SEO Group meets the first monday of each month.

We invite local Boston area SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.


Agenda:

6:45 to 7:00: Get Your Food/Drinks and Network

7:00 to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Tell us one thing you'd like to see the group do in the future

7:45 to 8:00: Wrap up

8:00 to 8:15pm: Main Course

Speaker:

Chris Brogan
http://www.chrisbroga...
Video on the Net | Network2 | PodCamp

Connect With Chris:
http://grasshopperfac...

Co-Founder of PodCamp that will be in Boston on October 26 - 28, 2007
http://podcamp.pbwiki...

Topic: SNO (Social Networking Optimization)

Using online digital tools to drive quality traffic through online social media.

8:15 to 8:45pm: Q & A

Questions and discussion for tonight's main course.


8:45 to 9:00 pm: Open Roundtable Challenge Discussion:

Please be specific about your challenges in your business or website. 3 to 5 min max spent on any one business model.


We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend.
Show full description

When and Where:

Monday, August 6, 2007 at 6:45 PM
Panera Bread, Arlington , MA 02474

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: The August Search Engine Optimization Meetup
